title: Every time I need to justify my Morde pick to my Teammates

replies.body:
OH GOD THE NOSTALGIA

http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/bioniclecomedycentral/images/4/44/Tumblr_mkxgrm2KgR1rt1ghyo1_500.gif/revision/latest?cb=20150407222205

WHAT DID I DO TO DESERVE THESE FEELS?

Not buying the newest sets.
That's why you deserve it you heathen! >:C

Bionicle died in my eyes.

I'm looking at those new sets like

http://static2.fjcdn.com/thumbnails/comments/Ah+corn+oilwhat+does+it+mean+_354969dce36735e45017295d8728764d.gif

WTF is this?! What have you done?! ;_;
Lego pliz

I just buy one Bionicle or Lego set every year.
It has become somewhat of a tradition for me, just like collecting swords or learning at least one new recipe a month.

The newer sets actually kinda improved and started going back to their roots. Took them way too long though.

Nothing beats the classics though.
The classics will always be the best. New Bionicle just doesn't have the same charm or feeling the old one had.

_Checks summoner name_
  Fair enough

They're actually cancelling the new generation after this year because the sales were too low. I think a big part of why it failed while early Bionicles succeeded and enthralled so many children (myself included) was the MNOG, which, dare I say it?, is a better game to me than LoL.

> [{quoted}](name=Malicious Metal,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=f1hFK1vB,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2016-08-02T01:07:59.380+0000)
>
> I just buy one Bionicle or Lego set every year.
> It has become somewhat of a tradition for me, just like collecting swords or learning at least one new recipe a month.
> 
> The newer sets actually kinda improved and started going back to their roots. Took them way too long though.
> 
> Nothing beats the classics though.

The classic bionicles...

HNNNNNNNG!

I loved them so fucking much. I remember I turned around for 5 minutes and someone mixed the pieces between my sets. I was so triggered (literally only time I've been so) that I tried to put my set back together, gave up, and proceeded to build the awesomest fucking T rex ever. Which was in turn destroyed by some kids a few weeks later.

I stopped buying them after I had all the spiders.
http://cache.lego.com/r/catalogs/-/media/franchises/bionicle%202014/characters/images/character%20top%20images%2016x9/70790-lord-of-skullspiders-top-image.jpg?l.r2=2046771805
I still cry when I read the comic when Matoro sacrifices himself to save Mata Nui.
Bionicle had a truly epic storyline.
Indeed. It also made an epic dent in my parents' wallets.

+1 for Bionicle

Malicious Metal just became the best poster of all time {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
http://img.pandawhale.com/87107-Batman-sad-crying-shake-head-g-gasD.gif
#feelsbadman
*feelsbatman
https://tse4.mm.bing.net/th?id=OIP.M69019e3fb91fb86ff5bc9a409fcd85b2o0&pid=15.1
http://i.imgur.com/Fu5Z3z8.gif?noredirect
Man, just thinking of the latest season of RWBY makes me sad...
Oh, god, don't let Laughing Fish hear that!
http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-ngCipk7pGg4/Uba8tZbWGGI/AAAAAAAAAlw/vAuE54dyY2Y/s1600/loki+too+late.gif
http://img.pandawhale.com/post-62678-The-Office-Dwight-its-true-gif-aMbG.gif

Oh! I have an idea! Bionicle Battlecast Figures:
{{champion:112}} {{champion:6}} {{champion:161}} {{champion:101}} {{champion:31}} {{champion:96}} {{champion:72}}
Just take my money
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
http://media.tumblr.com/tumblr_mejcy3jWUb1qfjeqa.gif
http://i0.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/173/576/Wat8.jpg?1315930535?noredirect

She was some kind of odd childhood crush of mine XD
Loved how scheming and evil she was
Childhood crush? She's -still- my crush. Seriously, I don't know how to stop and I need help PLEASESENDMEHELPNAO
I love you XD

Bionicle... Sidorak, if I remember correctly. Man, that gif takes me back.

Upvote for you.
Icarax was the Makuta in 2008 with the giant spinning shield and he wore Teridax's original mask, the Krahkan, correct?
Indeed he was. Icarax was my favorite character in the franchise.
Tbh, this is mainstream af sadly, but I've always been a big fan of Jaller and Gelu. So lit. Favorite baddie would probably be Karzahni or Hydraxon.

I was a hipster.
Loved all the underrated bad guys like Vamprah, Ehlek, Zaktan and so on
Too bad Bionicles didn't come on television in my country. I was a fan of the toys, though. I played so much with it!
I only ever saw the movies I'm afraid. I liked them but I never got any sets. I can't remember why lol.

That reminds me, I need to watch those Bionicle movies that I told myself I'd watch... 5 years ago. 

If it weren't for this post, I probably would have completely forgotten about Bionicle's existence.
Bionicle... isn't that that newfangled Lego thing with the comic books that never finish the plots?
How dare you. Bionicles were a damn masterpiece and literally saved Lego from failing back in the 2000s.
BIONICLE POST?! I LOVE YOU!

Oh no, the flashbacks of all the broken ball joint pieces! NO WHY DO YOU REMIND ME! They would always just get that little crack along one of the little holes that held the ball in place and then that joint would be all loose. 

But for real though I spent so many hours with these things, and I saw that golden mask movie so many times as a child. Mashing them together into huge mega versions was the best though.
Damn Bionicle post? You get an upboat just for that
If you have to justify your pick, then your teammates obviously never seen the boards lol. Otherwise they would know better than question you. XD

I remember dying so much as {{champion:82}} to the enemy ADC... I went like 1/8 as a support. All I needed to turn from 1/8 to 12/10 was 2 ults at their carry. 
Feels good to be useful after being nearly the reason we lost XD

I'm still waiting for the day where I randomly run into MM in a game and get curb stomped into the ground by his morde skills

a boy can dream about the perfect death cant he?

well mordekaiser is viable right?

And since you're in high elo, players know about your morde skills right?
